newsitem.title: USA: FCOJ futures settle mixed, prices firm on close.
newsitem.headline: FCOJ futures settle mixed, prices firm on close.

text.p: Speculative and fund buying gave the market a slight boost on the close to settle narrowly mixed and above session lows.

While September was the only contract to finish the day weaker, it remained well above support pegged at 119.00 cents a lb. The contract ended at 120.25, off 0.50, after trading from 120.50 to 119.55. November closed 0.15 firmer at 115.25, while the remaining months settled steady to 0.55 higher.
Steady trade selling pressured prices throughout most of the session.
Despite a dearth of news and an annual lull, volume was estimated to have reached 5,000 lots.
